summary: Modern portfolio website for Mukesh Kumar M, a UI/UX Developer - featuring Mobbin-style interface with advanced animations and UI/UX-focused interactive effects, minimalist dark theme with teal accents, animated hero section, timeline-based experience display, project showcases (Hospital and Travel Management systems), bento-grid skills section, and contact form. Built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, and Framer Motion.
